meanings.definition: The act of specializing or the process of becoming specialized.
meanings.sent1: Her specializations in art and music make her a well-rounded artist.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a variety of specializations in business administration.
meanings.sent3: His specializations in fixing things often lead to interesting DIY projects.
meanings.sent4: The team's specializations in different sports make them a versatile group.
meanings.sent5: The doctor's specializations in various medical fields save many lives.

meanings.definition: A particular area of study or expertise within a larger field.
meanings.sent1: His specializations in computer science led to a successful career in IT.
meanings.sent2: The conference will focus on different specializations within the field of psychology.
meanings.sent3: The chef's specializations in desserts always leave customers wanting more.
meanings.sent4: Her specializations in marketing strategies set her apart from other professionals.
meanings.sent5: The detective's specializations in solving cold cases are unmatched in the department.
